product_name: Peter Rabbit Organics Fruit Squeeze Pouch - 4 oz.
long_description: Peter Rabbit Organics Fruit Squeeze pouch is loaded with 100% organic fruit, making it easy for you to get your daily dose of goodness. Pouch is packed full of 100% fruit and has a thick, smooth texture; it's not diluted with water or juice and has no added sugar or preservatives. USDA organic ingredients are packaged in a BPA-free squeezable pouch; fruits can be enjoyed straight from the pouch. Unopened Peter Rabbit Organics Squeeze pouch does not require refrigeration; pouch fits easily in lunch boxes, handbags and backpacks. Cap design is suitable for use by young children; recommended for ages 6 mos. and older. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Peter Rabbit Organics Fruit Squeeze pouch is loaded with 100% organic fruit, making it easy for you to get your daily dose of goodness.
